website_summaries.verdict: Though a bit pricier than some other products, it's an enticing choice if you like the unique hanging features.
pros: Rope-style hangers function well and look great
cons: Some owners say their product didn't come with instructions, though this may not be an issue since installation is fairly straightforward

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a few old fluorescent lights with these LED ones. I can now see more than ever how much crap I need to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: jpmcgow

customer_reviews.title: Great light, but not quite perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one of these for $33 and it is a fantastic value! It makes a world of difference in my garage - I liked it so much I ordered two more at a higher price of $37 each - still a great deal. Except for the fact that the box shows a picture of "hanging" or "flush mounted" but I cannot find any way to flush mount them! The second set I bought were for a low-clearance area and the extra 2 inches between the light and the ceiling make it not work - I was counting on the flush mount!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: A great update to my garage
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is great. I did not anticipate that it can be adjusted in its height once hung up to the ceiling. So, 5-stars right of the back for this great product. Brightness, simply awesome. Nothing in my garage has any chance to hide - this light strip is light-years better than my old fixture with four fluorescence strips.
customer_reviews.author: Volker Schweyer

customer_reviews.title: It's super bright, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I've been converting the basement into a midrange supervillian lair and this shop light is just what I needed to illuminate the area in which A) soldering is done and B) Nefarious Plans are hatched. It's super bright, lightweight, and relatively easy to install. The hanging mech is clever and eliminates the need to be too precise with drilling and cable placement. BUT! You'll need to replace the included screws if you're fastening directly to rafters, or drill a pilot hole first because the screw heads strip easily. There's no shame in using drywall screws to finish the job, son. None at all.
customer_reviews.author: Herodotus Gothmog

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, like daylight.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. Took me about 15 - 20 minutes. Here’s the deal: Drill a hole, screw in the provided hardware, hang the light, plug it in. Easy. The light is blinding. Really bright. Like direct sunlight. Only issue is the lights; can they be replaced? Doesn’t look like it. So is it disposable hanging light? Also the cord is rather short and no hanging string on off switch. Just a cord that plugs in and switch like you’d find on desk lamp. Flick it on. Good value for $35-40.
customer_reviews.author: Biebs San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they look hi-tech and perform wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, they are a breeze to set up. The wires for hanging these make me think my garage is a high tech, sci-fi lab. They are very bright, I have 2 hanging in a 2 car garage, spaced out with one on each side. Just these two lights are enough for reading or working. They look very professional and are one of the best investments for my shop. Highly recommend if you want replace the old, tube-style fluorescent bulbs. The cold doesn't affect the LED's and they draw minimal power. If only I could talk my wife into letting me install these inside the house.....lol
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: When I first moved into my house one of the first things I did was replace all the old halogen and fluorescent can lighting with Hyperikon LED lights. What originally sold me on Hyperikon was their warranty and customer service. I have never had any kind of problem with any of their fixtures and this shop light is no exception. Probably spent a whole 15 minutes installing it. Bada bing bada boom.
customer_reviews.author: William V

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!  More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These LED shop lights are awesome! Small in size -- 2" X 4" X 49" -- light weight, and perfect brightness for shop or garage. The wire suspension system is ingenious and very practical. They have a bit of an "industrial" look and feel which is perfect for where they are likely to be used. I bought the 4-pack and one of the lights had a bad switch. I contacted Charles at Hyperikon and he is having a replacement sent to me directly. No questions asked. No hassle. Just great customer service. I will be buying more products from Amazon and Hyperikon as I phase out old incandescent and florescent CFL bulbs and fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Hunting

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the illumination
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fixture to illuminate the area above my workbench and it performs much to my satisfaction for the task. I do have a gripe with the length of the extension cord and position of the on/off switch. The cord and the positioning of the on/off switch is far too short for ceiling mounting applications. If it had a 8 foot cord length as most other corded ceiling lights, I would have rated 5 Stars. ( After my initial review the seller contacted me and helped to rectify the issue, therefore I am revising my evaluation to 4 stars).
customer_reviews.author: One Pony Show

customer_reviews.title: Serious Illumination
customer_reviews.text: Very and I do mean VERY bright. Well worth the cost. Mounting kit is great. No complaints here, all sunshine and rainbows and stuff. Well, mostly just super bright white LED light, not so much the sunshine. Or the rainbows. But get this thing (or a bunch of them) if you want to seriously illuminate an area. Note: I put one of these over an area approximately 400 square feet, at a height of 12 feet, and it fully illuminates the intended area plus quite a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled upon occasion

customer_reviews.title: Bright and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Pulling it out of the box, I was disappointed at first. I thought "This thing must be too small to put out bright light." Then I hung it up a few feet from our "regular sized" led light that is also rectangular shaped. When I turned it on I was pleasantly surprised. This light is compact but powerful. Lightweight. Clear, steady light. The hanging mechanism was awkward but not enough to remove my five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: A light light.
customer_reviews.text: The fixture itself is great, but the screws to mount the cable fitting to the support surface are soft and the Phillips head is easily stripped. You also have to be very careful not to loose the binding screws as they are small and easily fall out before tightening them all the way. While I lost one of the screws, this wasn't a major problem for me as I needed to hang the unit with longer wires so used my own arrangement to hang the unit and discarded the provided cable and related fittings. The unit is also UL Listed, an important part of my purchasing decision.
customer_reviews.author: Foozler

customer_reviews.title: Don't love the hanging mechanism--- once you shorten you can't make ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't love the hanging mechanism--- once you shorten you can't make longer again. Also, it is, and I know I am being picky here, almost a bit TOO bright. I have over the washing machine and i am a bit sorry so see some of kids clothes that well (do they even wash?). Was easy to hang though, bright, not too much of that "LED delay" thing (like 1 sec) when you flip the switch. I have one light in a 8x10 area and it is plenty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Loralei Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Bright and no heat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an antique show booth. Bright and very lightweight. No heat comes off the fixture. After the show I have mounted it on some greenhouse shelving for wintering-over succulents and small plants. Don't know if it is daylight or ultraviolet, but the plants are loving it, greening up and growing. I will buy another one for my plants.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: “ Let there be light.”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shop light for my newly built 10’x11’ pallet shed. Originally I had some work lights but they only illuminated the parts of my shed that the light was aimed at. I had a hard time working in the shed after dark because I could barely see. I mounted this light on the ceiling and I can now see every inch of my shop. Spending time in the shop after dark is now longer a problem. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: misbebes4

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright light. The installation process is dead simple too, once you decipher the instructions. One thing I didn't realize was the light is not distributed at 180°, but more like 150° angle, leaving items a foot below the ceiling darker than everything else. It is bright enough to not be an issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Yardie

customer_reviews.title: Great LED fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great LED fixture. Replaced old 4 tube fluorescent fixture. Very bright (wonderful sunlight quality light) and a breeze to install. I'm trying to determine if it is dimmable, but haven't found out yet. You can't beat the price. RK
customer_reviews.author: Randall P. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Install
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Not flimsy sheet metal but solid extruded aluminum. However, I have not installed it yet. The old ceiling fixture was screwed to the ceiling and power came thru' a hole in the fitting. There is no hole in the HyperSelect. I now need to find an electrician to install it. This should be clarified in the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product w/ 10 yr Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this purchase - thought I was going to have to supply my own LED bulbs and it truly came plug-n-play. Very bright, very compact. Used my existing rafter suspension hardware (from the old fluorescent fixture). Gives a very bright light and also discovered the 10 yr. warranty card inside. Cool. Planning to replace the other 3 fixtures with this very same when they go out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright, well made light at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty bright. 35w of LED seems slightly brighter than the equivalent 100w of incandescent light. Bright Daylight color spectrum as advertised. There is a short delay turning on .5 to 1 seconds which appears to be a short time the LED driver needs to start up. This doesn't affect my use of it. I like the mounting system quite a bit, easy to install. The built in switch seems like decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: incredible bright light
customer_reviews.text: This is one bright light and a great value. lights up a 2 car garage quite well. only knock would be the width, it is not large enough to cover the wiring junction box so the wires are exposed. you can always buy a cover plate and cut a hole for wires.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Green

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Received this LED light fixture yesterday and had it installed in less than 30 mins. Super bright and I like the way it uses thin cables to hang. I left the cable lengths untrimmed in case I need to adjust the fixture height for any reason. The price is considerably lower than the big his stores.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B.

customer_reviews.title: nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: very light weight but seems very solid and sturdy, plenty of light for a 5 x 10' shed I mounted it on the wall above the door- just screwed in the 2 brackets 2' apart and slid fixture onto the brackets, took <5min- no need for the suspension hardware
customer_reviews.author: Carcajou301

customer_reviews.title: After looking around for one that plugged in I finally came to amazon and off course found the perfect size and it was even better than I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my husbands work bench. After looking around for one that plugged in I finally came to amazon and off course found the perfect size and it was even better than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice shop lights
customer_reviews.text: No more fluorescent light buzz. I liked the cable and clip mounting system. It is adjustable for a variety of distances from the ceiling or rafters, or can be mounted directly to a surface. It is bright, but not obnoxiously so. I would prefer a pull chain switch over the provided inline rocker switch on the cord. I just rewired my outlets to be on a switch, but would rather not have done so.
customer_reviews.author: Dapperdan

customer_reviews.title: WELL DESIGNED AND MADE
customer_reviews.text: Elegantly designed and well made. A treat to work with a product as good as this. I had it up on the excellent hanger system in a short time. So much better then the old two-light fluorescents with chain hangers.
customer_reviews.author: James Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great light - nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Great light - nice and bright. The mounting system is elegant and versatile, but complicated to use the first time. Fortunately there are very clear instructions, which I encourage you to read and follow - even those of you who, like me, normally don't read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K Hansma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Lights up my work bench very well. I have it hanging about 3 or 4 feet above it. No issues installing it.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Ask an you shall receive!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just an absolute great light! Very bright an very easy to install! These are the go to lights! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: This light is great, very bright. This first one went in the basement above the washer/dryer and the wife loves them. As soon as the rest of my fluorescent tubes burn out, I will get another, thanks much.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and looks great until I found dents on it. Attached is a picture of one of the dents. I purchased one to see how the brightness is and I expected it to be a tad bit brighter...
customer_reviews.author: Panduhh

customer_reviews.title: My eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great garage light, exceptionally bright though, needs a diffuser. I bought two from Amazon warehouse deals and plan on getting more to fill the garage. They can either be suspended or mounted directly to the ceiling, very easy to install. 10/10, would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kylon F.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! VERY VERY VERY COOL! 2 YEARS LATER!
customer_reviews.text: NIce, two 4' replaced four 8'CFL fixtures and my garage is 4 times brighter using a fraction of power. AMAZING! I do recomend!
customer_reviews.author: For the people.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and very easy to install. The light is amazing and pure!!! Before I start any new project I can see I have some cleaning up to do. I am buying 4 more!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: NtotheS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light!!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. I have a 2-car garage and it lights up my work space with about 200 foot candles...Everything can be seen...It's awesome. Need 3 more...soon...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright lights! Interesting hanging hardware. Great price. I've bought other LED lights from this seller and have never had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sadesky

customer_reviews.title: absolutely and outstanding unit
customer_reviews.text: This shop light is a must for any shop. The fixture is well made and emits excellent clear light. It is ideal for my assembly bench and is far superior to other shop lights.
customer_reviews.author: jim mack

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my basement florescent ceiling light. This is much ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my basement florescent ceiling light. This is much brighter. Had to cut the plug in off and use wire nuts.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Great lights.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Bright and small footprint. Used in my garage and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mangold

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. The price was low for an led 4 ft light. It is bright. I also like the hardware to hang the light, simple, effective and so easy to use to hang the fixture. I'm sure I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: WSP49045

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: produces a lot of light. Assembly was easy. Price is right. I plan to replace my flourescent lights in my workshop with a few of these. Puts out more light than two 4ft shop lights.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Bright
customer_reviews.text: They surprised me with how much light they gave off.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tanar

customer_reviews.title: No instructions diy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very bright. One star off because there were no instructions in the box and I'm dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this light
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright.it replaced an old shop light that had fluorescent tubes.the new light is very lite weight. Order was delivered early than expected. Would definitely recommend this light!! Very pleased with purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Since I was replacing an old Florescent light that was hung from hooks, it was pretty easy to create a loop from the included hanging hardware. So far this is a great light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light for yoour shop or garage.
customer_reviews.text: What great shop lights. Much better than the previous florescentws because of the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright easy to hang and turn on
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and ordered more
customer_reviews.text: Used this light for my garage and my mud room, see picture of how much light it gives off. Works perfect and ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Really bright.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Have 6 in a 24' X 28' garage. Ceiling mounted at 9'. Really bright.
customer_reviews.author: Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great Garage/Shop light.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: They work great and were installed in just a few minutes. I love the light and energy savings over traditional fluorescent shop lights
customer_reviews.author: Cory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Hyperselect Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have installed my Hyperselect light fixture and am completely satisfied with the product as well as the ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to set up (I did a flush mount) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, is this light bright! It was so easy to set up (I did a flush mount) and use. I may have to switch my other lights now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright LED
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for florescent replacement. Bought a second and was a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: fish-n-fool

customer_reviews.title: well designed and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This light is a great value, it is solidly made and works reliably in an unheated garge in upper midwestern US. It puts out a bright yet not harsh light that helps me see what I am working on
customer_reviews.author: PGW Small Engine Repair

customer_reviews.title: Loved it right up to the point that I saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it right up to the point that I saw Walmart had the same thing on sale for $19 less
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these LED shop Lights for my 12x24 foot shed/workshop. After feeling how light the box was, I was a little apprehensive as to how good they'd work. The set up was simple and quick. Once I turned them on-WOW was I blown away! They were much brighter than I expected and look wonderful in my shop! They look very professional, and the cable adjustment just tops the cake! I'm planning to buy two more for my garage. I highly recommend these shop lights to anyone looking for stylish bright LED lights for a workshop, garage, or anywhere more light is needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Broadcaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super easy install. bright, clear light. i plan on ordering 2 more. Would highly recommend. update- still awesome. Purchased my other 2.
customer_reviews.author: lhall

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this light in a small basement storage room. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: FC-Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one LED shop light for my basement laundry area and loved it so much rhat i gor another. Its lightweight, really bright a d easy to install. Just get this its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman's friend

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, very bright
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, very bright. Not quite instant on but close. Very clever and simple hanging mechanism. Could use stronger screw. Sheared the head off of one of them. I liked the first two so much, I bought 20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Jim van Oss

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed to a plug-in receptacle
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Easily installed to a plug-in receptacle. Adjustable hanging height. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: fairweather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and easy install. will buy again for the house.
customer_reviews.author: motto

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and not harsh light.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and not harsh light. Good so far. Liked the 1st one and bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Melnic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice light. They are very sleek and the mounting is very easy and unique.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cambareri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great light, bright and easy to install once we figured out how
customer_reviews.author: cat5dog1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this light that I put this up in my garage. Very bright.
customer_reviews.author: James F McCall

customer_reviews.title: Bright Idea
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light in my shop! Should have done this a long tome ago!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Is a crisp bright light works well in the laundry room. Noticed one thing about the light is that it doesn't shine as wide as the old light did
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Affordable LED garage fixture
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and provides great light in my garage. After buying one light I was so impressed that I purchased a four pack for other parts of my garage and also our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Green

customer_reviews.title: LED Shop Lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the new design of this light. Very sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Coley

customer_reviews.title: LED Shop lights
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the money, never will use Florescent fixtures again.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great little light, nice and bright.
customer_reviews.text: Nice LED light. Better than I expected with a simple way to adjust the height of the light. Can be adjusted in height up or down about 2 ' once mounted. Found this useful, lowering when I needed more light closer to the work and then simple to raise it back up when done.
customer_reviews.author: XABTr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a great addition to my garage workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Deweerd

customer_reviews.title: Probably going to buy few more of these
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, great light color and brightness. Thinking about replacing all of my 4' tube fixtures with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for F96T12
customer_reviews.text: Great little light. Small, but puts out a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: these are SWEET!!
customer_reviews.text: goodbye fluorescent non working in the cold lights!!!!!......these are SWEET!!
customer_reviews.author: 92Asstchief

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, very easy to install, and very bright. If I had one complaint, it would be that it does not come on instantly. Pfft.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Bright, lightweight, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Bought two of these to replace two aging, humming eight-foot fluorescents in my workshop (after the ballast in one nearly caught fire). They are bright! I think the light output of one is comparable to the eight-footers I removed; at any rate, it's sufficient. Super lightweight & easy to install. Instructions don't explain the direct-mount method but it's easy enough to figure out. Now I'm wishing I had plunked down for the four-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Alhazred

customer_reviews.title: HyperSelect LED shop light
customer_reviews.text: This light is good quality and installed very nicely. I really like the way the wire rope hangers work. Great light, I will be getting some more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jacker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Light, brighter than the 4 ft. fluorescent lights it replaced, and was easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to install. Gives off great light!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These lights put out a lot of light, but ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights put out a lot of light, but I had one stop working. Amazon did replace the broken shop light.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pyo

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a LED light from Home Depot. Ordered one of these to replace another set that went bad and this one is much brighter. I love it. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Luce

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome shoplight
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an amazing fixture and light. It is very bright, and the fixture is all metal and beautifully constructed.. the mounting hardware is almost like a work of art. Highly recommend this over fluorescents.
customer_reviews.author: TVGuideDog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount and gives excellent light for my work area
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Good/bad
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bad packaging. Item is bent in at least 2 places.
customer_reviews.author: Corie Chase

customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a similar product from Home Depot. When compared to the HyperSelect , the light from HD were pricier and not nearly as efficient. Would order these again for my shop and any other place they could be of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Mary Ditlove

customer_reviews.title: This is a great light and I received it quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light and I received it quickly. Install was easy and now my work area is well lit
customer_reviews.author: Mrogues

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Was very easy to install and great price. One thing to note. You need a small philips head to install barrel into ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Micki Watanabe Spiller

customer_reviews.title: superior quality & fully functional with hanging clips & wire
customer_reviews.text: superior quality & fully functional with hanging clips & wire. lightweight. super bright. excellent. id give it 10 stars if i could
customer_reviews.author: P. Boyles

customer_reviews.title: I like the HyperSelect LED lights very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the HyperSelect LED lights very much, however there is a split second delay between activating the switch & actually seeing light.

customer_reviews.title: Elated lights the shop way better than the 4 foot fluorescent it replaced
customer_reviews.text: Elated lights the shop way better than the 4 foot fluorescent it replaced

customer_reviews.text: Just installed them this week the work well. And look great. They were easy to Install. I may buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the basement and my work shop Thank You for a great product

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lights!
customer_reviews.text: Lights are very bright. They are light weight. We were able to hang them using the hardware supplied. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: The light is a little smaller than I expected but once I plugged it in it made up for its size with how bright it is. Definitely will be ordering more of these lights very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lights, easy to install at a good price
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light. Bought it for my workshop and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BJJones

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a low price. My only complaint is that there is a slight delay of the light turning on once the switch is flipped
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I loved the sleek design of it
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. I loved the sleek design of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hyperikon 4 Foot LED Shop Light, Shop and Garage Lighting, 35 Watts, Clear, Daylight, UL, DLC
feature_bullets: 4000 KELVIN & 128 LUMENS PER WATT - Illuminate your work space with 4,500 lumens for a fraction of the wattage without constant replacement. Plug and play for 5000k of instant full brightness with no flicker.
VERSATILE MOUNTING - Hyperikon’s integrated fixture works with you. Choose between two mounting options: suspended or fixated on the ceiling.
INCREASE PRODUCTIVITY - Our CRI84+ Utility Shop Light provides energizing, bright light to help you stay focused without eyestrain or headaches.
EASY INSTALL - Difficult installation is now a thing of the past! Use the included installation guide to wire the light to power for amazingly bright light.

5 YEAR WARRANTY - When we say we've got you covered, we mean it. Should your product fail within the first 5 years from the date of purchase we will fulfill our promise and replace it free of charge to you.

specifications.Special Features: Shatter resistant, Shock and vibration resistant, UV and Mercury Free, Waterproof, No RF Interference
